meanings.definition: Having eight sides and eight angles.
meanings.sent1: The octagonal table in the room was perfect for our family dinners.
meanings.sent2: The new building had an octagonal tower that stood out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The octagonal pizza box was a hit at the party, everyone loved its unique shape.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened as she saw the octagonal pattern on the floor, it was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The octagonal garden maze was challenging to navigate but incredibly beautiful.

meanings.definition: A shape with eight sides and eight angles.
meanings.sent1: The children played with an octagonal puzzle, trying to fit the pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign at the intersection was octagonal, signaling drivers to halt.
meanings.sent3: The cake was baked in the shape of an octagonal, much to the surprise of the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The mirror reflected an octagonal room, creating an illusion of endless space.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry box had an octagonal design, making it a unique gift for her birthday.
